rule.name: Eye of the Ancestors
rule.effect: If your Army Faction is Leagues of Votann, each time an enemy unit destroys a Leagues of Votann unit from your army, that enemy unit gains 1 Judgement token. An enemy unit can never have more than 2 Judgement tokens (any further Judgement tokens a unit would gain beyond this are ignored).

tokens.rule: Each time a model from your army with this ability makes an attack that targets a unit that has one or more Judgement tokens, until that model’s attacks have been resolved, apply the relevant bonus from the table below to that attack.

two.name: Now We’ve Got a Grudge to Settle
two.effect: Add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

detachments.name: Oathband
detachments.effect: At the start of the battle, select a number of units from your opponent’s army depending on the battle size, as shown below, those units start with 2 judgement tokens

select.rule: If, at the start of any of your Command phases, any of those units have been destroyed, you gain a number of CP depending on how early in the battle you destroyed it, as shown below (you can only gain CP in this way once per battle, and CP gained in this way are an exemption to the Core Rules that limit the maximum number of CP you can gain per battle round to 1).

options.effect: Unit destroyed by the start of your first or second Command phase grant 3CP
Unit destroyed by the start of your third or fourth Command phase grant 2CP
Unit destroyed by the start of your fifth Command phase grant 1CP

enhancements.name: Appraising Glare
enhancements.effect: Leagues of Votann model only. In your Command phase, you can select one objective marker your opponent controls. Until the start of your next Command phase, while an enemy unit is within range of that objective marker, it counts as having one more Judgement token than it actually has (to a maximum of 2).

enhancements.name: A Long List
enhancements.effect: Leagues of Votann model only. Each time the bearer’s unit destroys an enemy unit, if that enemy unit has one or more Judgement tokens, you can select one other enemy unit that is visible to the bearer. That other unit gains one Judgement token.

enhancements.name: Grim Demeanour
enhancements.effect: Leagues of Votann model only. You can re-roll Battle-shock tests taken for the bearer’s unit, and models in that unit can ignore any or all modifiers to their characteristics and/or to any rolls or tests made for them (excluding modifiers to saving throws).

enhancements.name: Wayfarer's Grace
enhancements.effect: Leagues of Votann model only. The first time the bearer is destroyed, after placing a Judgement token next to the unit that destroyed it, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set the bearer back up on the battlefield as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.

stratagems.name: Warrior Pride
stratagems.when: Fight Phase
stratagems.target: One Leagues of Votann unit from your army, and one enemy unit that has one or more Judgement tokens and is within Engagement Range of that Leagues of Votann unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack that targets that enemy unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1 for each Judgement token that enemy unit has.

stratagems.name: Ancestral Sentence
stratagems.when: Your Shooting Phase
stratagems.target: One Leagues of Votann unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability, and each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that has one or more Judgement tokens, that attack has the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead.

stratagems.name: Ordered Retreat
stratagems.when: Your Movement phase, just after a Leagues of Votann unit from your army Falls Back.
stratagems.target: That Leagues of Votann unit.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge.

stratagems.name: Reactive Reprisal
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit that has one or more Judgement tokens has resolved its attacks.
stratagems.target: One Leagues of Votann unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Your Leagues of Votann unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target the enemy unit that just attacked it, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.

stratagems.name: Newfound Nemesis
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has resolved its attacks.
stratagems.target: One Leagues of Votann Infantry or Leagues of Votann Mounted unit from your army that was reduced to Below Half-strength as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: The attacking unit gains 1 Judgement token, or up to 2 Judgement tokens instead if that Leagues of Votann unit contained your Warlord when it was targeted by those attacks.

stratagems.name: Void Armour
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One Leagues of Votann unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your Leagues of Votann unit, worsen the Armour Penteration characteristic of that attack by 1.

data.name: Ancestral Fortune
data.effect: Once per turn, you can change one Hit roll or one Wound roll made for this model to a 6.

data.name: The Destined
data.effect: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 1.

data.name: Grim Efficiency
data.effect: Once per battle round, in your Command phase, you can select one model from your army with this ability, then select one enemy unit that is visible to that model. That enemy unit gains 1 Judgement token.

wargear.name: Rampart Crest
wargear.effect: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

leader.name: Kindred Hero
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

leader.name: Teleport Crest
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Deep Strike ability.

data.name: Grim Efficiency
data.effect: Once per battle round, in your Command phase, you can select one model from your army with this ability, then select one enemy unit that is visible to that model. That enemy unit gains 1 Judgement token.

wargear.name: Rampart Crest
wargear.effect: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

leader.name: Exemplar of the Einhyr
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for that unit.

data.name: Mass Driver Accelerators
data.effect: Each time this model ends a Charge move, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this unit and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

wargear.name: Teleport Crest
wargear.effect: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Deep Strike ability.

wargear.name: Weavefield Crest
wargear.effect: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

leader.name: Fortify (Psychic)
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, improve the Toughness characteristic of models in that unit by 1.

data.name: Grimnyr’s Regard
data.effect: Once per battle, after this model’s unit fails a Battle-shock test, this model can use this ability. If it does, that unit is no longer Battle-shocked.

leader.name: Multispectral Visor
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: Brôkhyr’s Guild
data.effect: At the end of your Movement phase, this unit can repair one friendly Leagues of Votann Vehicle or Exo-frame model within 3" of it. That model regains up to D3 lost wounds, or up to 3 lost wounds instead if this unit contains an Ironkyn Assistant. Each model can only be repaired once per turn.

data.name: Luck Has. Need Keeps. Toil Earns
data.effect: At the end of your Command phase, if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

wargear.name: Pan Spectral Scanner
wargear.effect: Ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer’s unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

wargear.name: Comms Array
wargear.effect: Each time you target the bearer’s unit with a Stratagem, roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

wargear.name: Medipack
wargear.effect: Models in the bearer’s unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.

wargear.name: Weavefield Crest
wargear.effect: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

data.name: Oathband Bodyguard
data.effect: While a Character is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than this unit’s Toughness characteristic, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

wargear.name: Teleport Crest
wargear.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Deep Strike ability.

wargear.name: Weavefield Crest
wargear.effect: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

data.name: Cyberstimms
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

data.name: Subterranean Explosives
data.effect: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, select one enemy unit (excluding Monsters and Vehicles) that was hit by one or more of this unit’s mole grenade launchers this phase and roll one D6. On a 4+, until the end of your opponent’s next turn, that enemy unit is shaken. While a unit is shaken, subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.

data.name: Outflanking Mag-Riders
data.effect: At the end of your opponent’s turn, if this unit is within 6" of any battlefield edge and is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, you can remove this unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

wargear.name: Comms Array
wargear.effect: Each time you target the bearer’s unit with a Stratagem, roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

wargear.name: Pan Spectral Scanner
wargear.effect: Ranged weapons equipped by models in the bearer’s unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

wargear.name: Rollbar Searchlight
wargear.effect: Each time a model in the bearer’s unit makes an attack that targets a unit that contains one or more models with the Stealth ability, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: Blistering Advance
data.effect: Units can disembark from this Transport after it has Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move that phase, and cannot declare a charge in the same turn, but can otherwise act normally in the remainder of the turn.

data.name: Oathband Covering Fire
data.effect: Each time you target this unit with the Fire Overwatch Stratagem, hits are scored on unmodified Hit rolls of 5+ when resolving that Stratagem.

data.name: Fire Support
data.effect: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit it scored one or more hits against this phase. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly model that disembarked from this Transport this turn makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

wargear.name: Pan spectral scanner
wargear.effect: Ranged weapons equipped by the bearer have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

rule.name: Power from Pain
rule.effect: At the start of any phase, you can expend one or more Pain tokens from your Pain token pool. Each time you do, select one unit from your army with the Power from Pain ability. Until the end of the phase, that unit is Empowered, and gains the abilities listed below, depending on the phase.
rule.move: If empowered in the Movement or Fight phase you can re-roll Advance or Charge rolls made for that unit.
rule.shoot: If empowered in the Shooting or Fight phase each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.
gain: Each time an enemy unit is destroyed, you gain 1 Pain token.
Each time an enemy unit fails a Battle-shock test, you gain 1 Pain token.

detachments.name: Realspace Raiders
detachments.effect: At the start of the battle, you gain an additional 1 Pain token for each of the following your army contains

enhancements.name: Crucible of Malediction
enhancements.effect: Haemonculus model only. Once per battle, at the start of any Shooting phase, the bearer can use this Enhancement. When it does, every enemy unit within 12" must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test if the bearer’s unit is currently Empowered. Each time a Psyker unit fails this test, it suffers D3 mortal wounds.

enhancements.name: Blood Dancer
enhancements.effect: Succubus model only. Improve the Attacks and Armour Penetration characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons by 1. While the bearer is Empowered, Improve the Attacks and Armour Penetration characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons by 2 instead.

enhancements.name: Labyrinthine Cunning
enhancements.effect: Archon model only. Each time you select the bearer’s unit as the target of a Stratagem, roll one D6, adding 3 to the result if the Stratagem being used is Alliance of Agony: on a 4+, you gain 1CP.

enhancements.name: The Art of Pain
enhancements.effect: Drukhari model only. In your Command phase, if the bearer is on the battlefield, you gain 1 Pain token.

stratagems.name: Prey on the Weak
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One Kabal unit from your army and one enemy unit that is Below Half-strength.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: Acrobatic Display
stratagems.when: Your Charge phase.
stratagems.target: One Wych Cult unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, your unit is eligible to declare a charge even if it Fell Back or Advanced this turn.

stratagems.name: Strike and Fade
stratagems.when: End of your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One Drukhari unit from your army (excluding Aircraft).
stratagems.effect: Your unit can immediately make a Normal move.
stratagems.restrictions: Until the end of the turn, your unit is not eligible to declare a charge and that unit cannot embark within a Transport at the end of this move.

stratagems.name: Alliance of Agony
stratagems.when: Start of any phase.
stratagems.target: One Archon, one Succubus and one Haemonculus from your army.
stratagems.effect: Discard one Pain token from your Pain token pool. Until the end of the phase, all three of those models’ units are Empowered.
stratagems.restrictions: You can only use this Stratagem if you are able to select all three of the target models stated above.

stratagems.name: Insensible to Pain
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One Haemonculus Covens unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

stratagems.name: Quicksilver Reactions
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One Drukhari unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack that targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot target a Haemonculus Covens unit from your army for this Stratagem.

leader.name: Overlord
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. While that unit is Empowered, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

data.name: Devious Mastermind
data.effect: Once per battle, after your opponent uses a Stratagem, if this model is your Warlord and is on the battlefield, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the battle, increase the cost of that Stratagem to your opponent by 1CP.

You cannot re-roll invulnerable saving throws made for this model. The first time an invulnerable saving throw made for this model is failed, until the end of the battle, this model has no invulnerable saving throw.

data.name: Beastmaster
data.effect: While this unit contains a Beastmaster model, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for this unit, and each time a Beast model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

data.name: Lhamaean
data.effect: While this unit contains one or more Lhamaean models, weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

data.name: Medusae
data.effect: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if any of those attacks made with its eyeburst scored a hit against an enemy Infantry unit, that Infantry unit must take a Battle-shock test.

data.name: Sslyth
data.effect: While this unit contains one or more Sslyth models, each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

data.name: Ur-ghul
data.effect: While this unit contains one or more Ur-ghul models, this unit has the Fights First ability

In the Declare Battle Formations step, this unit can join one Kabalite Warriors unit from your army that is being led by an Archon (a Kabalite Warriors unit cannot have more than one Court of the Archon unit joined to it). If it does, until the end of the battle, every model in this unit counts as part of that Kabalite Warriors unit, and its Starting Strength is increased accordingly.

data.name: Pain Parasite (Aura)
data.effect: Each time a Pain token is removed from your Pain token pool to Empower a unit, if that Empowered unit is within 9" of this unit, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1 Pain token.

leader.name: Master of Blades
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

data.name: Vicious Execution
data.effect: Once per battle, when this model’s unit is selected to fight, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by this model have the [PRECISION] ability, and each time an enemy Character model is destroyed by this model, you gain D3 Pain tokens. If that destroyed Character model was the enemy Warlord, you gain 3 Pain tokens instead.

data.name: Mindless Killing Machines
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 4+, do not remove it from play; that destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and it is then removed from play.

leader.name: Master of Pain
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

data.name: Fear Incarnate (Aura)
data.effect: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, each time a Battle-shock or Leadership test is taken for that enemy unit, subtract 1 from that test.

data.name: Hit and Run
data.effect: This unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

wargear.name: Phantasm Grenade Launcher
wargear.effect: The bearer’s unit has the Grenades keyword.

data.name: Tormentors
data.effect: At the start of the Fight phase, each enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more units with this ability must take a Battle-shock test.

data.name: Sadistic Raiders
data.effect: If you control an objective marker at the end of your Command phase, and this unit (or any Transport it is embarked within) is within range of that objective marker, that objective marker remains under you control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

wargear.name: Phantasm Grenade Launcher
wargear.effect: The bearer’s unit has the Grenades keyword.

leader.name: Brides of Death
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Fights First ability, and each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack and improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

data.name: Thrilling Spectacle
data.effect: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, this model can use this ability. When it does, until the end of the phase, the Attacks characteristic of Lelith’s blades is increased to 12 and this model’s invulnerable save is increased to 3+.

data.name: Fade Away
data.effect: At the end of your opponent’s turn, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove this unit from the battlefield. In the Reinforcements step of your next Movement phase, set it up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models. If the battle ends and this unit is not on the battlefield, it is destroyed.

data.name: Aethersails
data.effect: Each time this model Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of this model.

data.name: Eradicate the Foe
data.effect: Each time this model makes an attack that targets an enemy unit that is at its Starting Strength, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If a unit has a Starting Strength of 1, this ability only applies if the target has its starting number of wounds.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time it makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Ground Attack Craft
data.effect: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit (excluding units that can Fly), add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: Eviscerating Fly-by
data.effect: Each time this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit (excluding Monster and Vehicle units) that it moved over during that move. If you do, roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

wargear.name: Cluster Caltrops
wargear.effect: Each time you roll to inflict wounds using this unit’s Eviscerating Fly-by ability, you can re-roll one D6 for each model in this unit equipped with cluster caltrops.

wargear.name: Grav-talon
wargear.effect: The bearer’s melee weapons have the [LANCE] ability.

data.name: Winged Strike
data.effect: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". If it does, until the end of the turn, this unit is not eligible to declare a charge.

leader.name: Storm of Blades
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

data.name: Combat Drugs
data.effect: If this model is Empowered in the Fight phase, then until the end of the phase, models in this model’s unit, have the Fights First ability.

data.name: Pain Engine
data.effect: If this unit destroys an enemy unit, until the end of the battle, it is Empowered.

data.name: Fleshcraft
data.effect: At the end of your Movement phase, this model can heal one friendly Cronos, Talos, Grotesques or Wracks unit within 6". If it does, one model in that unit regains up to 3 lost wounds (if you selected a Wracks unit, up to 3 destroyed models are returned to that unit instead).

data.name: Horrific Regeneration
data.effect: The first time this model is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.

data.name: Athletic Aerialists
data.effect: At the end of the Fight phase, if there are no models currently embarked within this Transport, you can select one friendly Drukhari Infantry unit that has 6 or fewer models that is wholly within 6" of this Transport (you cannot select a Grotesques unit or a unit that can Fly). Unless that unit is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can embark within this Transport.

data.name: Void Mine
data.effect: Once per battle, after this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy model it moved over during that move and roll one D6 for each enemy unit within D6" of that enemy model: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: The Torturer’s Craft
data.effect: Each time this unit destroys an enemy unit, you gain 1 Pain token. When this unit is destroyed, you gain 1 Pain token.

data.name: No Escape
data.effect: Each time an enemy unit (excluding Monsters and Vehicles) within Engagement Range of one or more units from your army with this ability is selected to Fall Back, models in that enemy unit must take Desperate Escape tests as if their unit was Battle-shocked. When doing so, if that enemy unit is also Battle-shocked by other means, subtract 1 from each of those Desperate Escape tests.

wargear.name: Phantasm Grenade Launcher
wargear.effect: The bearer’s unit has the Grenades keyword.

data.name: Scything Charge
data.effect: Each time this model ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6: on a 2-3, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, each time it makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

rule.name: For the Greater Good
rule.effect: If your Army Faction is T’au Empire, then in your Shooting phase units from your army can work in pairs to help each other target specific enemy units. When they do this, one unit is the Observer unit and the other is their Guided unit. The enemy they are targeting is called their Spotted unit. Each time you select this unit to shoot, if it is not an Observer unit, it can use this ability. If it does, select one other friendly unit with this ability that is also eligible to shoot (excluding Fortification, Battleshocked and Observer units). Until the end of the phase, this unit is considered a Guided unit, and that friendly unit is considered an Observer unit. Then select one enemy unit that is visible to both your units to be their Spotted unit.
size: Until the end of the phase:

Each time a model in a Guided unit makes an attack that targets their Spotted unit, improve the Ballistic Skill characteristic of the attack by 1 and, if their Observer unit has the Markerlight keyword, the attack has the [IGNORES COVER] ability.
Each time a model in a Guided unit makes an attack that does not target their Spotted unit, worsen the Ballistic Skill characteristic of the attack by 1.

detachments.name: Kauyon
restrictions: If your army includes any Ethereal units, it cannot include a Commander Farsight model.
If your army includes a Commander Farsight model, it cannot include any Ethereal units.
detachments.effect: From the third battle round onwards, all ranged weapons equipped by T’au Empire models from your army have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. While a unit is a Guided unit (see For the Greater Good), weapons in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead.

enhancements.name: Exemplar of the Kauyon
enhancements.effect: T’au Empire model only (excluding Kroot Shaper models). While the bearer is leading a unit, that unit’s Kauyon Detachment rule takes effect from the second battle round onwards instead of the third.

enhancements.name: Puretide Engram Neuroship
enhancements.effect: T’au Empire model only (excluding Kroot Shaper models). Once per turn, you can use a Stratagem on the bearer’s unit, even if you have already used that Stratagem on a different unit this phase.

enhancements.name: Precision of the Patient Hunter
enhancements.effect: T’au Empire model only. Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. From the third battle round onwards, add 1 to the Wound roll as well.

enhancements.name: Through Unity, Devastation
enhancements.effect: T’au Empire model only (excluding Kroot Shaper models). While this model is leading a unit, each time that unit is an Observer unit, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in their Guided unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability while targeting their Spotted unit.

stratagems.name: Stimm Injectors
stratagems.when: Fight phase or your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One T’au Empire Battlesuit unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.

stratagems.name: Coordinate to Engage
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One T’au Empire unit from your army that has just been selected as an Observer unit (see For the Greater Good).
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack that targets their Spotted unit, improve the Ballistic Skill characteristic of that attack by 1 and, if your unit has the Markerlight keyword, that attack has the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

stratagems.name: Strike and Fade
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One T’au Empire Battlesuit unit from your army that can Fly whose attacks have been resolved this phase.
stratagems.effect: If your unit is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can make a Normal move. If it does, your unit cannot declare a charge this turn.

stratagems.name: Point-Blank Ambush
stratagems.when: Your Shooting phase.
stratagems.target: One T’au Empire unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within 9", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot use this Stratagem during the first or second battle rounds.

stratagems.name: Photon Grenades
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
stratagems.target: One T’au Empire Grenades unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge.
stratagems.effect: That enemy unit must immediately take a Battle-shock test, and until the end of the phase, subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for that enemy unit.

stratagems.name: Combat Emarkation
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Charge phase, just after an enemy unit has declared a charge.
stratagems.target: One T’au Empire Infantry unit from your army that was selected as one of the targets of that charge, and one friendly Transport.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can embark within that Transport. If it does, your opponent can select new targets for that charge.
stratagems.restrictions: Every model in your T’au Empire Infantry unit must be within 3" of that Transport and there must be sufficient transport capacity to embark the entire unit.

data.name: Agile Combatant
data.effect: This model is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

data.name: Hero of the Empire (Aura)
data.effect: While a friendly T’au Empire unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

wargear.name: Advanced Guardian Drone
wargear.effect: Each time a ranged attack targets the bearer, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

wargear.name: Command-link Drone (Aura)
wargear.effect: While a friendly T’au Empire unit is within 6" of the bearer, each time you select that unit as the target of a Stratagem, roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

leader.name: Way of the Short Blade
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within 9", add 1 to the Wound roll.

data.name: Aggressive Offensive
data.effect: Once per battle, when this model is selected to fight, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time it makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

leader.name: Crisis Commander
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

wargear.name: Battlesuit Support System
wargear.effect: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

wargear.name: Shield Generator
wargear.effect: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear.name: Weapon Support System
wargear.effect: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

leader.name: Enforcer Commander
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a ranged attack targets that unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

wargear.name: Battlesuit Support System
wargear.effect: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

wargear.name: Shield Generator
wargear.effect: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear.name: Weapon Support System
wargear.effect: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

leader.name: Coldstar Commander
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a Move characteristic of 12" and ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

wargear.name: Battlesuit Support System
wargear.effect: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

wargear.name: Shield Generator
wargear.effect: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear.name: Weapon Support System
wargear.effect: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

leader.name: Volley Fire
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit.

data.name: Crack Shot
data.effect: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, on a Critical Wound, that attack has an Armour Penetration characteristic of -3.

leader.name: The Shaper Commands
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability. If models in that unit destroy an enemy unit in the Fight phase, then until the end of the battle, while this model is leading that unit, models in the unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability instead.

data.name: Ritualistic Feeding
data.effect: Each time this model ends a Charge move, until the end of the turn, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of its Shaper’s ritual blade.

leader.name: Failure Is Not an Option
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

data.name: Coordinated Leadership
data.effect: In your Command phase, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1CP.

wargear.name: Hover Drone
wargear.effect: The bearer can Fly and has a Move characteristic of 10".

data.name: Duality Shield
data.effect: Once per battle, each time an attack targets this unit, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have a 2+ invulnerable save.

data.name: Paradox of Duality
data.effect: Each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll and subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

data.name: Supreme Loyalty (Aura)
data.effect: While a friendly T’au Empire unit is within 6" of this unit, each time that unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, add 1 to that test.

leader.name: Inspirational Defiance
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

data.name: Martial Warrior
data.effect: Each time this model is selected to fight, select one of the following abilities to be active while resolving those attacks:
Direct Grace: Fidelity has the [PRECISION] ability.
Forceful Strike: Fidelity has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.
Whirling Stance: Fidelity has the [SUSTAINED HITS 2] ability instead of [SUSTAINED HITS 1].

leader.name: Structural Analyser
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

data.name: Jammer Array
data.effect: Enemy units that are set up on the battlefield from Reserves cannot be set up within 12" of this model.

data.name: Armour Hunter
data.effect: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: XV02 Pilot Battlesuit
data.effect: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly Hammerhead Gunship unit within 12". Until the start of your next Command phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Cover Fire
data.effect: While this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, each time you select it as the target of the Fire Overwatch Stratagem, hits are scored on unmodified Hit rolls of 4+ when resolving that Stratagem.

data.name: DS8 Support Turret
data.effect: In your Movement phase, if this unit Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, its Fire Warrior Shas’ui model is equipped with the support turret missile system weapon.

data.name: Breach and Clear
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

data.name: DS8 Support Turret
data.effect: In your Movement phase, if this unit Remains Stationary, until the start of your next Movement phase, its Fire Warrior Shas’ui model is equipped with the support turret missile system weapon.

data.name: Grisly Feast
data.effect: If this unit destroys an enemy unit in the Fight phase, until the end of the battle, models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability

data.name: Kroot Packmates
data.effect: While one or more friendly Kroot Carnivore units are within 6" of this unit, each time a model in this unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: Turbo-jets
data.effect: Each time this unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.

wargear.name: Battlesuit Support System
wargear.effect: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

wargear.name: Shield Generator
wargear.effect: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save.

wargear.name: Weapon Support System
wargear.effect: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

data.name: Forward Observers
data.effect: Each time this unit is an Observer unit, until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack is made by a model in their Guided unit that targets their Spotted unit, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

wargear.name: Battlesuit Support System
wargear.effect: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

wargear.name: Homing Beacon
wargear.effect: Once per battle, you can use the Rapid Ingress Stratagem for 0CP. The target must be set up within 3" of the bearer’s unit and not within 9" of any enemy units.

data.name: Stealth Drones
data.effect: Twice per battle, after an attack has been allocated to this model, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0.

wargear.name: Battlesuit Support System
wargear.effect: The bearer is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back but it loses the Smoke keyword.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Precise Targeting
data.effect: While this model is a Guided unit, each time it makes an attack that targets its Spotted unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

data.name: Target Uploaded
data.effect: Once per turn, when using the Greater Good ability, you can select this unit to be an Observer unit for a second time. When doing so, you can change which enemy unit is this unit’s Spotted unit.

wargear.name: Grav-inhibitor Drone
wargear.effect: Subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for any enemy unit that declares a charge against the bearer’s unit (this is not cumulative with any other reductions to that Charge roll).

wargear.name: Pulse Accelerator Drone
wargear.effect: Add 6" to the Range characteristic of pulse carbines equipped by models in the bearer’s unit.

wargear.name: Recon Drone
wargear.effect: The bearer is equipped with 1 drone burst cannon and the bearer’s unit has the Infiltrators ability.

data.name: Drone Harassment Tactics
data.effect: At the end of your Movement phase, select one enemy unit within 12" of this unit; that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

data.name: Airborne Agility
data.effect: At the end of your Movement phase, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, you can remove it from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

data.name: Hunting Pack
data.effect: While one or more friendly Kroot Carnivore units within 6" of this unit are within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

data.name: Advanced Armour
data.effect: Models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds.

wargear.name: Battlesuit Support System
wargear.effect: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back, but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks.

wargear.name: Weapon Support System
wargear.effect: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

data.name: Battlesuit Support System
data.effect: The bearer is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

data.name: Nova Charge
data.effect: Once per battle, in your Shooting phase, select one ranged weapon equipped by this model. Until the end of the phase, that weapon has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

data.name: Weapon Support System
data.effect: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Armour Hunter
data.effect: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: Targeting Array
data.effect: Each time this model is selected to shoot, you can re-roll one Hit roll or you can re-roll one Wound roll when resolving those attacks.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Aerial Scanners
data.effect: Each time this model makes an attack with a ranged weapon that targets a unit that can Fly, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

data.name: Targeting Array
data.effect: Each time this model is selected to shoot, you can re-roll one Hit roll or you can re-roll one Wound roll when resolving those attacks.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Rapid Deployment
data.effect: Units can disembark from this Transport after it has Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move that phase, and cannot declare a charge in the same turn, but can otherwise act normally in the remainder of the turn.

data.name: Ground Strike Fighter
data.effect: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit that cannot Fly, add 1 to the Hit roll.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Pulse Bombs
data.effect: Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll six D6: for each 3+, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Heavy Walker
data.effect: Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over models (excluding Titanic models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

data.name: Support System
data.effect: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

data.name: Titan-killer
data.effect: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a Titanic or Towering unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, subtract 3 from this models Objective Control characteristic, and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.effect: Each time a model makes a ranged attack that targets the bearer’s unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
The bearer’s unit has the Markerlight keyword and can act as an Observer unit for another unit even if it Advanced this turn.
Add 1 to the bearer’s Wounds characteristic.

data.name: Bounty Hunters
data.effect: At the start of the battle, select one unit from your opponent’s army. Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets that unit, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] and [PRECISION] abilities.

wargear.name: Pech’ra
wargear.effect: Ranged weapons equipped by the bearer’s unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

rule.name: WAAAGH!
rule.effect: If your Army Faction is Orks, once per battle, at the start of the battle round, you can call a Waaagh! If you do, until the start of the next battle round:
select: Orks units from your army are eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which they Advanced.
Add 1 to the Strength and Attacks characteristics of melee weapons equipped by Orks models from your army.
Orks models from your army have a 5+ invulnerable save.

detachments.name: WAAAGH! Tribe
detachments.effect: Melee weapons equipped by Orks models from your army have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

enhancements.name: Follow Me Ladz
enhancements.effect: Orks model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, add 2" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.

enhancements.name: Headwoppa's Killchoppa
enhancements.effect: Orks model only. Melee weapons equipped by the bearer that do not have the [EXTRA ATTACKS] ability have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

enhancements.name: Kunnin' but Brutal
enhancements.effect: Orks model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

enhancements.name: Supa-Cybork Body
enhancements.effect: Orks model only. The bearer has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

stratagems.name: Careen!
stratagems.when: Any phase, just after an Orks Vehicle unit from your army with the Deadly Demise ability is destroyed.
stratagems.target: That destroyed Orks Vehicle unit, if you roll a 6 for its Deadly Demise ability. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
stratagems.effect: Your unit can make a Normal or Fall Back move before its Deadly Demise ability is resolved, and before any embarked units perform an Emergency Disembarkation. When making this move, your unit can move over enemy units (excluding Monsters and Vehicles) as if they were not there.

stratagems.name: Orks is Never Beanten
stratagems.when: Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One Orks unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making attacks, and is then removed from play.

stratagems.name: Unbridled Carnage
stratagems.when: Fight phase.
stratagems.target: One Orks unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an Orks model in your unit makes a melee attack, an unmodified hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.

stratagems.name: 'Ard as Nails
stratagems.when: Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
stratagems.target: One Orks unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
stratagems.restrictions: You cannot select a Vehicle or Gretchin unit for this Stratagem.

stratagems.name: Mob Rule
stratagems.when: Your Command phase.
stratagems.target: One Mob unit from your army that contains 10 or more models and is not Below Half-strength.
stratagems.effect: Until the start of your next Command phase, while a friendly Orks Infantry unit is within 6" of that Mob unit, that Orks Infantry unit can still be selected as the target of your Stratagems even if it is Battle-shocked.

stratagems.name: 'Ere We Go
stratagems.when: Start of your Movement phase.
stratagems.target: One Orks Infantry unit from your army.
stratagems.effect: Until the end of the turn, add 2 to Advance and Charge rolls made for your unit.

data.name: Ramshackle but Rugged
data.effect: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

wargear.name: ’Ard Case
wargear.effect: Add 2 to the bearer’s Toughness characteristic, but it no longer has the Firing Deck ability.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Monster Hunters
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

leader.name: Beastboss
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: Beastly Rage
data.effect: Each time this model makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, melee weapons it is equipped with have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

data.name: ’Ere We Go (Aura)
data.effect: While a friendly Beast Snagga unit is within 6" of this model, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for that unit.

data.name: Single-minded Predator
data.effect: You can target this model with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 1CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

leader.name: More Dakka
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

data.name: Fix Dat Armour Up
data.effect: While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase, you can return 1 destroyed Bodyguard model to that unit.

wargear.name: Kustom Force Field
wargear.effect: While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks.

wargear.name: Grot Oiler
wargear.effect: Once per battle, at the end of your Movement phase, one model in the bearer’s unit regains D3 lost wounds.

roster.name: Big Mek with Kustom Force Field
keywords: Big Mek with Kustom Force Field

leader.name: More Dakka
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

leader.name: Kustom Force Field
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save against ranged attacks. Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can overcharge its kustom force field. If it does, until the end of the phase, this invulnerable save is improved to 4+.

wargear.name: Grot Helper
wargear.effect: Once per battle, the bearer can overcharge its kustom force field one additional time.

roster.name: Big Mek with Shokk Attack Gun
keywords: Big Mek with Shokk Attack Gun

leader.name: More Dakka
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

data.name: Deranged Snotling Assault
data.effect: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks; that unit must take a Battle-shock test.

wargear.name: Grot Assistant
wargear.effect: Once per battle, after rolling to determine how many attacks the bearer’s shokk attack gun makes, you can re-roll that dice.

data.name: Boom Bomb
data.effect: Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll one D6: on a 4+, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Dust Trails (Aura)
data.effect: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

leader.name: Red Skull Kommandos
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Benefit of Cover.

data.name: Kunnin’ Infiltrator
data.effect: Once per battle, in your Movement phase, instead of making a Normal move with this model’s unit, you can remove it from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

leader.name: Drill Boss
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: Plummeting Descent
data.effect: You can re-roll Charge rolls made for this model’s unit in a turn in which it was set up on the battlefield from Reserves.

data.name: Breakin’ Heads
data.effect: While a Warboss model is leading this unit, in your Command phase, the first time a Battle-shock test is failed for this unit that phase, if it is within range of an objective marker, you can choose to break some heads. If you do, 1 Bodyguard model in this unit is destroyed and you can re-roll that test.

data.name: Pyromaniaks
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack with a burna that targets an enemy unit within 6", re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If the target of that attack is also within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

data.name: Burna Bomb
data.effect: Each time this model ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move. Until the end of the turn, models in that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover. In addition, roll one D6 for each model in that unit: for each 6, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Dakkastorm
data.effect: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, every successful Hit roll scores a Critical Hit.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Piston-driven Brutality
data.effect: At the start of the Fight phase, each enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more units with this ability must take a Battle-shock test.

leader.name: Speedboss
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: High-octane Fuel
data.effect: Each time this model’s unit Advances, do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this model’s unit.

data.name: Deff from Above
data.effect: Each time this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit it moved over during that move and roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

data.name: Gun-crazy Show-offs
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit targets the closest eligible target with its snazzgun, until the end of the phase, that weapon has an Attacks characteristic of 4.

wargear.name: Ammo Runt
wargear.effect: Once per battle, when this unit is selected to shoot, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

leader.name: Prophet of Da Great Waaagh!
leader.effect: While this unit is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

data.name: Ghazghkull’s Waaagh! Banner (Aura)
data.effect: While a friendly Orks unit is within 12" of Makari, if you have called a Waaagh! this battle round, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

data.name: Makari
data.effect: Makari has a 2+ invulnerable save, You cannot re-roll invulnerable saving throws made for this model.

data.name: Clankin’ Forward
data.effect: Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over enemy models (excluding Monster and Vehicle models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

data.name: Big an’ Stompy
data.effect: Each time this model makes a melee attack, if you have called a Waaagh! this battle round, add 1 to the Hit roll.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 4 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic, and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Runtherd
data.effect: While this unit contains one or more Gretchin models, each time an attack targets this unit, Runtherd models in this unit have a Toughness characteristic of 2.

data.name: Thievin’ Scavengers
data.effect: At the start of your Command phase, roll one D6 for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it. If one or more of those rolls is a 4+, you gain 1CP.

data.name: Bail Out, Boyz!
data.effect: If this Transport is destroyed, you can re-roll the dice when determining if a disembarking model’s unit suffers mortal wounds.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

leader.name: Flashiest Gitz
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

data.name: Ded Glowy Ammo (Aura)
data.effect: While an enemy Infantry unit is within 6" of this model, subtract 1 from the Toughness characteristic of models in that unit.

data.name: Spirit of Gork (Psychic)
data.effect: At the start of the Fight phase, you can select one friendly Orks unit within 12" of this model and roll one D6: on a 1, this model suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2-5, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit; on a 6, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Strength characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit and those weapons have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Shooty Power Trip
data.effect: Each time this unit is selected to shoot, you can roll one D6: on a 1, the nearest other friendly Orks unit within 12" of and visible to this unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

data.name: Sneaky Surprise
data.effect: Enemy units cannot use the Fire Overwatch Stratagem to shoot at this unit.

wargear.name: Distraction Grot
wargear.effect: Once per battle, in your opponent’s Shooting phase, before making a saving throw for a model in this unit, it can deploy the distraction grot. If it does, until the end of the phase, models in this unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.

wargear.name: Bomb Squig
wargear.effect: Once per battle, after this unit ends a Normal move, select one enemy unit within 12" of this unit and roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

data.name: Rivetin’ Dakka
data.effect: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks made with a rivet kannon. Until the start of your next turn, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Dat’s Our Loot!
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If that attack targets a unit that is within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.

leader.name: Mad Dok
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

data.name: One Scalpel Short of a Medpack
data.effect: While this model is leading a unit, that unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back.

data.name: Krumpin’ Time
data.effect: During the battle round in which you call a Waaagh!, melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

data.name: Drill Through
data.effect: Each time this model ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6: on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.

data.name: Mekboy
data.effect: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly Orks Vehicle units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.

data.name: Mekaniak
data.effect: At the end of your Movement phase, you can select one friendly Orks Vehicle model within 3" of this model. That Vehicle model regains up to D3 lost wounds, and, until the start of your next Movement phase, each time that Vehicle model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn.

data.name: Splat!
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a unit containing 10 or more models, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

data.name: Clankin’ Forward
data.effect: Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over enemy models (excluding Monster and Vehicle models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

data.name: Big an’ Shooty
data.effect: Each time this model makes a ranged attack during the battle round in which you called a Waaagh!, add 1 to the Hit roll.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, subtract 4 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic, and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Da Bigger Dey iz…
data.effect: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of that attack. Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Titanic unit, add 2 to the Damage characteristic of that attack instead.

data.name: Hungry Chompa
data.effect: Each time this model declares a charge, until the end of the turn, each time this model makes an attack, an unmodified successful Wound roll of 5+ scores a Critical Wound.

leader.name: Hogboss
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: Hunt Them Down
data.effect: During the battle round in which you call a Waaagh!, this model’s big choppa has the [ANTI-MONSTER 3+] and [ANTI-VEHICLE 3+] abilities.

data.name: Plant the Waaagh! Banner
data.effect: Once per battle, at the start of the battle round, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the start of the next battle round, this model’s unit gains the benefits of the Waaagh! ability as if you had called a Waaagh! this battle round.

data.name: Da Boss Iz Watchin’
data.effect: While this model is gaining the benefits of the Waaagh! ability, it has a 4+ invulnerable save and an Objective Control characteristic of 5.

data.name: Da Boss’ Ladz
data.effect: While a Warboss model is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

wargear.name: Ammo Runt
wargear.effect: Once per battle for each ammo runt this unit has, when this unit is selected to shoot, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

leader.name: Dok’s Toolz
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

data.name: Sawbonez
data.effect: At the end of your Movement phase, select one friendly Beast Snagga Character model within 3" of this model. That model is healed and regains up to 3 lost wounds. Each model can only be healed once per turn.

wargear.name: Grot Orderly
wargear.effect: Once per battle, in your Command phase, if the bearer is leading a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can return up to D3 destroyed Bodyguard models to that unit.

leader.name: Dok’s Toolz
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.

data.name: Hold Still and Say ‘Aargh!’
data.effect: Each time an attack made by this model with its ’urty syringe scores a Critical Wound against a unit (excluding Vehicle units), that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

wargear.name: Grot Orderly
wargear.effect: Once per battle, in your Command phase, if the bearer is leading a unit that is below its Starting Strength, you can return up to D3 destroyed Bodyguard models to that unit.

data.name: Buzzer Squigs
data.effect: Each time this model makes an attack with its squig launchas that targets an Infantry unit, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: Squig Mine
data.effect: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, select one enemy unit within 3" of this model and roll one D6: on a 4+, that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

data.name: Shokk Tunnel
data.effect: Each time this model is selected to Advance, you can remove it from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

data.name: Wild Ride
data.effect: You can ignore any or all modifiers to this unit’s Move characteristic and to Advance and Charge rolls made for this unit.

wargear.name: Bomb Squig
wargear.effect: Once per battle for each bomb squig this unit has, after this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit within 12" of it and roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

data.name: Waaagh! Effigy (Aura)
data.effect: While a friendly Orks unit is within 12" of this model, each time you take a Battle-shock test for that unit, add 1 to that test.

data.name: Stompin’ Forward
data.effect: Each time this model makes a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over models (excluding Titanic models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-10 wounds remaining, subtract 6 from this model’s Objective Control characteristic and each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

data.name: Full Throttle
data.effect: This unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced. If it does, before making that Charge move, roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 1, this unit suffers 1 mortal wound. You cannot use this ability during the battle round in which you call a Waaagh!.

data.name: Tank Hunters
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.

data.name: Bomb Squigs
data.effect: Twice per battle, after this unit ends a Normal move, you can select one enemy unit within 12" of it and roll one D6: on a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

data.name: Grot Riggers
data.effect: At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound.

data.name: Drive-by Dakka
data.effect: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a unit within 9", improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.

leader.name: Might is Right
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: Da Biggest and da Best
data.effect: When you call a Waaagh!, until the start of the next battle round, add 4 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s melee weapons.

leader.name: Might is Right
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

data.name: Dead ’ard
data.effect: When you call a Waaagh!, until the start of the next battle round, this model has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

data.name: Blastajet Attack Run
data.effect: Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that cannot Fly, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

wargear.name: Blastajet Force Field
wargear.effect: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save, but it loses the Grenades keyword.

damaged.effect: While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

leader.name: Waaagh! Energy
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Strength and Damage characteristics of this model’s ’Eadbanger weapon for every 5 models in that unit (rounding down), but while that unit contains 10 or more models, that weapon has the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

data.name: Da Jump (Psychic)
data.effect: Once per turn, at the end of your Movement phase, one Weirdboy from your army can use this ability. If it does, roll one D6: on a 1, that Weirdboy’s unit suffers D6 mortal wounds; on a 2+, remove this Weirdboy’s unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

leader.name: Waaagh! Energy
leader.effect: While this model is leading a unit, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s Eyez of Mork weapon for every 5 models in that unit (rounding down), but while that unit contains 10 or more models, that weapon has the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

data.name: Roar of Mork (Psychic)
data.effect: In your opponent’s Command phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this Psyker and roll one D6: on a 1, this Psyker’s unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2+, until the start of your opponent’s next Command phase, each time a Battle-shock or Leadership test is taken for that enemy unit, subtract 2 from that test.

leader.name: Special Dose
leader.effect: When you call a Waaagh!, until the start of the next battle round, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this model’s unit.

leader.name: Super Runts
effect: While this model is leading a unit
Models in that unit have the Scouts 9" ability.
Each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.
Each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

data.name: Ramshackle Cover
data.effect: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fortification, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

data.name: Shoutin' Pole (Aura)
data.effect: While a friendly Orks unit is within 6" of this Fortification, improve the Leadership characteristic of models in that unit by 1.

data.name: Fortification
data.effect: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more Fortifications from your army: 1)That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. 2)Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle Shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models while doing so.

data.name: Ramshackle Cover
data.effect: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fortification, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

data.name: Workshop
data.effect: When this Fortification is set up, all parts of it must be set up within 1" of another part. At the end of your Movement phase, each friendly Orks Vehicle model within 12" of this Fortification can regain up to D3 lost wounds (roll separately for each model). Each model can only be affected by this ability once per turn

data.name: Fortification
data.effect: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more Fortifications from your army: 1)That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. 2)Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle Shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models while doing so.
